title: What song best describes the champion of your choice!
body:
So the rules are that you can only choose one champion and one song for said champion. The song must describe the champion. 

So mine is Poison by Alice Cooper for Cassiopeia. :D 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Qq4j1LtCdww

replies.body:
{{champion:82}} 
Iron Man - Black Sabbath
Ace of Spades - Motorhead
Creeping Death - Metallica
Symphony of Destruction - Megadeath
Children of the Grave - Black Sabbath

shaco

{{champion:35}}  Tiptoe thru the tulips by tiny tim
Imagine shaco slowly walking towards/near you singing that in his ole shaco voice.
Leading you to your grave :D
